desc: Home of the second largest student-run career fair in the nation. The 2022 Virginia Tech Engineering Expo is hosted by the Student Engineers' Council with over 350+ companies in attendance in 2019.

layout.text: Welcome to the 43rd Annual Engineering Exposition

The Engineering Expo at Virginia Tech is the second largest student-run career fair in the country. The Expo provides an opportunity for employers to connect with Virginia Tech students and provide more information on the positions they need to fill. Employers often have internships, co-op positions, and full-time jobs they are looking to have filled by Virginia Tech students.
